mapper.select: select * from keshi_wq where Kname_wq like #{Kname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update keshi_wq set Kname_wq = #{Kname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Kfuzeren_wq = #{Kfuzeren_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ktel_wq = #{Ktel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Kjianjie_wq = #{Kjianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ktime_wq = #{Ktime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Kid_wq = #{Kid_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER }
mapper.insert: insert into keshi_wq ( Kname_wq, Kfuzeren_wq, Ktel_wq, Ktime_wq, Kjianjie_wq ) values ( #{Kname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Kfuzeren_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ktel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ktime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Kjianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
